DOC.brief_summary: Primary aim study evaluate association postoperative cognitive dysfunction increase serum level S100B protein robot-assisted laparoscopic radical prostatectomy .
DOC.detailed_description: The neurocognitive assessment protocol design evaluate general cognitive function identify patient cognitive dysfunction . Neuropsychological test patient conduct one day prior surgery , first day surgery , 30 th day surgery , respectively . According consensus statement , cognitive function ass use battery seven neuropsychological test : Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test ( delay recall ) , Trail Making Test ( Parts A B ) , Digit Span Test ( forward backward ) , Grooved Pegboard Test ( dominant non-dominant hand ) . Postoperative cognitive dysfunction ( POCD ) define decline > 20 % preoperative test score least two seven test . Serum level S100B protein obtain venous blood sample collect surgery , anesthesia induction , immediately surgery 24 h postoperatively .
DOC.criteria: 50 year old schedule roboticassisted laparoscopic radical prostatectomy body mass index range 18 kg/m2 25 kg/m2 American Society Anesthesiologists class I , II III Patients previous neurological deficit ( symptomatic stroke , hemorrhage , transient ischemic attack ) neurologic disorder ( epilepsy , trauma , intra extracranial malignancy ) psychiatric disease ( schizophrenia , depressive disorder ) alcoholism drug dependence serious hear visual impairment
